text: Claude Jorda (born 16 February 1938, in Bône, Algeria) is a French jurist and former Judge at the International Criminal Court (2003–2007). He resigned "for reasons of permanent ill-health".International Criminal Court (8 May 2007). Resignation of Judge Claude Jorda . Accessed 18 January 2008. Previously, he had been a Judge at the International Criminal Tribunal for the former Yugoslavia (ICTY) since January 1994. ==References== ==External links== *Profile at ICC Category:1938 births Category:Living people Category:People from Annaba Category:French jurists Category:French judges Category:International Criminal Tribunal for the former Yugoslavia judges Category:Presidents of the International Criminal Tribunal for the former Yugoslavia Category:International Criminal Court judges Category:French judges of United Nations courts and tribunals Category:French judges of international courts and tribunals
title: Claude Jorda
